record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 5613 AND S. 2920
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 5613 AND S. 2920 -- (Senate - April 28, 2008)

[Page: S3415]

speaking.paragraph: I understand there are two bills at the desk due for a second reading.

record.chair: The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 5613) to extend certain moratoria and impose additional moratoria on certain Medicaid regulations through April 1, 2009.
A bill (S. 2920) to reauthorize and improve the financing and entrepreneurial development programs of the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to these bills, en bloc.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bills will be placed on the calendar.
